node.dox:d:
@mainpage
An interface to control the dash in Unity-2d.

interface.name: com.canonical.Unity2d.Dash
interface.dox:d: An interface to control the dash in Unity-2d.

method.name: activateHome
method.dox:d: Activates the Dash and shows the Home section

property.name: active
property.dox:d: True if the Dash is active

signal.name: activeChanged
signal.dox:d: Signals when the active status of the Dash changes

arg.name: active
arg.dox:d: True if the Dash is active

signal.name: activePlaceEntryChanged
signal.dox:d: Signals when the currently active place in the Dash changes
